headline: Fiserv, Inc. (FI) Signs New $8 Billion Revolving Credit Facility
summary: Fiserv, Inc. (NYSE:FI) is among the 13 Best S&P 500 Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street Analysts. On August 12, the company announced that it had signed a new credit agreement with JPMorgan Chase Bank, with a maximum aggregate principal amount of $8 billion.
